mapper.select: select c.prod_code,p.prod_subcode,p.prod_color,p.prod_size,c.cart_qty,pi.prod_price,c.cart_qty*pi.prod_price as cart_amount,img.prod_img from cart c,product_info pi,product p,product_img img where c.prod_code=p.prod_code and p.prod_subcode=pi.prod_subcode and pi.prod_subcode=img.prod_subcode(+) and nvl(img.prod_mainimg,'1')='1' and c.user_id = #{user_id}
select nvl(sum(c.cart_qty*pi.prod_price),0) as total_amount from cart c, product p, product_info pi where c.prod_code=p.prod_code and p.prod_subcode=pi.prod_subcode and c.user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.insert: insert into cart values (#{user_id}, (select prod_code from product where prod_size=#{prod_size} and prod_color=#{prod_color} and prod_subcode=#{prod_subcode}), 1, sysdate)
